title: A Spirited Conversation with Theresa Caputo
description:
You may know Theresa Caputo as TLC’s “Long Island Medium.” She’s been communicating with the dead for as long as she can remember. But it’s not as scary or even as hoaky as you might think — sometimes, the messages are exactly what you need.

Visit Theresa’s website and follow her on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter

Listen to Hey Spirit wherever you get your podcasts

For a chance to be a guest on Hey Spirit, call 1-877-TCAPUTO

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App. 

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--

Support us by supporting our sponsors!

Spark curiosity and learning with Kiwi Co. Get 50% off your first month, plus free shipping with promo code SMILE at kiwico.com.

Break out of your recipe rut with Hello Fresh. Get $80 off plus free shipping with CODE: 80SMILE. Go to HelloFresh.com/80SMILE
